ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: • Identify and prioritize project tasks and risks • Support various sourcing and supply projects by providing relevant data analytics and recommendations. • Support the development of long range strategic sourcing plans to reduce total costs, optimize value from suppliers, and meet internal customer requirements. • Coordinate project reviews; communicating project status and top engineering issues to project team and management • Coordinate design process to ensure design meets intended project goals • Coordinate and delegate incoming procurement requests from all employees. • Drive suppliers / vendors, integrating their deliverables and schedules into project • Partner with internal and external stakeholders to capture and develop key requirements and work to direct into appropriate buying channels in order to extract maximum value. • Lead and manage special projects to ensure procurement objectives are being met; collaborate with procurement team and business unit stakeholders

ul.li: • Ability to filter and distill relevant information for the right audience
• Self motivated and proactive with demonstrated creative and critical thinking skills
• Understands and deals well with rapid development cycles; remains flexible and calm in the face of ambiguity
• Detailed knowledge and understanding of product development processes
• Detailed project tracking and track record of meeting deliverables
• Experience interfacing with operations team, vendors and contractors

div.p: As a Procurement Specialist within Apple’s Special Projects organization, you will be responsible for managing project schedules, budgets, and vendors. We are a group of self-starters, capable of providing on-site leadership with an eye for detail. We have a solid track record of delivering projects on time while exemplifying the utmost attention to quality. Candidate will work in close collaboration with various cross-functional engineering and design teams, vendors, and contractors.
* BS Degree with 5-10 years of direct experience required
